title: Pixel’s At a Glance may soon keep track of your grocery pickups and deliveries
content:
It should soon be possible to use the At a Glance widget on Pixel phones to keep track of your grocery orders, including when pickups are ready and when deliveries are on their way.

more…

The post Pixel’s At a Glance may soon keep track of your grocery pickups and deliveries appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: At a Glance widget on Pixel phones will soon be able to track your grocery orders, including pickup times and when deliveries are en route.
